Package ChatServer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatApplication
    This clsas represents the logic of the chat server
    ChatClient
    This class represents a client in the chat.
    ChatClientHandler
    This class handles a single chat client in the server It implements runnable to perfom its job asynchronously
    ChatClientsManager
    This class manages all the clients in the server performs actions on them and handles the active clients
    ServerConfiguration
    Server configurations
    ThreadPool
    This class represents a thread pool
    WorkingThread
    A thread that executes tasks from the tasks queue
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClientDisconnectedException
    Exception of client diconnection
